alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 8:49PM EST until January 15 at 8:24AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Calhoun. Green River at Paradise. .Recent heavy rainfall and snow melt, combined with elevated water levels traveling downstream from the Green River at Rochester, will keep the Green River in minor flood stage this week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Monday the stage was 385.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 385.9 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
